dt: {bc}a piece used to fill a hole {bc}{sx|stopper||}
{bc}an obtruding or obstructing mass of material resembling a stopper
{bc}a small core or segment removed from a larger object
{bc}an inferior often aged or unsound horse
{bc}an artificial fishing lure used primarily for casting and made with one or more sets of gang hooks
{bc}any of various devices resembling or functioning like a plug: such as
{bc}a male fitting for making an electrical connection to a live circuit by insertion in a receptacle (such as an outlet)
{bc}a device for connecting electric wires to a jack
{bc}a piece of favorable publicity or a favorable mention usually incorporated in general matter

et: Dutch, from Middle Dutch {it}plugge{/it}; akin to Middle High German {it}pfloc{/it} plug
shortdef: a piece used to fill a hole : stopper
an obtruding or obstructing mass of material resembling a stopper
a flat compressed cake of tobacco

dt: {bc}to stop, make tight, or secure by inserting a plug
{bc}to remedy (a deficiency) as if by inserting a plug

dt.t: trying to {wi}plug{/wi} the gaps in their understanding

dt: {bc}to connect or become connected to by or as if by means of a plug

dt.t: the city was {it}plugged into{/it} the new highway system

dt: {bc}to load into as if by means of a plug

shortdef: to stop, make tight, or secure by inserting a plug
to remedy (a deficiency) as if by inserting a plug
to hit with a bullet : shoot

dt: {bc}a feature of a computer system by which peripherals are automatically detected and configured by the operating system

shortdef: a feature of a computer system by which peripherals are automatically detected and configured by the operating system

dt: {bc}a man's stiff hat (such as a bowler or top hat)

shortdef: a man's stiff hat (such as a bowler or top hat)

dt: {bc}designed to be connected to an electric circuit by plugging in

shortdef: designed to be connected to an electric circuit by plugging in

dt: {bc}a small piece of software that supplements a larger program (such as a browser)

shortdef: a small piece of software that supplements a larger program (such as a browser)

dt: {bc}to establish an electric circuit by inserting a plug
{bc}to attach or connect to an electric receptacle (such as an outlet)

shortdef: to establish an electric circuit by inserting a plug
to attach or connect to an electric receptacle (such as an outlet)
thug, tough; especially : one hired to intimidate

dt: {bc}to continue doing something even though it is difficult or boring

dt.t: She kept {it}plugging away at{/it} her homework.

shortdef: to continue doing something even though it is difficult or boring —often + at

dt: {bc}a heating element in a diesel-engine cylinder to preheat the air and facilitate starting
{bc}a similar element for ignition in other internal combustion engines

shortdef: a heating element in a diesel-engine cylinder to preheat the air and facilitate starting; also : a similar element for ignition in other internal combustion engines
